answer: The WHO Academy issues digital credentials designed to be viewed and shared online. 📜 You also have the option to download your credentials and print them out as needed.
answer_formatted: The WHO Academy issues digital credentials designed to be viewed and shared online. 📜 You also have the option to download your credentials and print them out as needed.
